alert.note: Alert for Chase; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 7:50AM CDT until May 27 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Plymouth. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, More sections along Road A floods especially at the low water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 32.7 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Cottonwood River Plymouth 32.0 5.3 Tue 7 am CDT 27.9 32.7 31.9 &&
info.instruction: Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
